meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a tiger in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The boy's tigerish growl scared his little sister.
meanings.sent2: The tigerish stripes on the cat made it look fierce.
meanings.sent3: The tigerish dog tried to pounce on its own tail.
meanings.sent4: Her tigerish determination to win the race was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The tigerish eyes of the predator locked onto its prey.

meanings.definition: Showing aggression or fierceness like a tiger.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler had a tigerish strength that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The tigerish expression on his face warned others to stay back.
meanings.sent3: The tigerish competitor roared in victory after the match.
meanings.sent4: Her tigerish competitiveness drove her to train harder.
meanings.sent5: The tigerish roar echoed through the forest, sending shivers down their spines.
